name: BIOS Health
headline: Neural interfaces to understand and use nerve data in medicine.
description: BIOS Health was previously called Cambridge Bio-Augmentation Systems (CBAS) and focused on prosthetic neural interfaces as a first market. Now we use

![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/282fa6_be0b726565ae4e5e89bb225cb3925cf9f000.jpg/v1/fill/w_1080,h_600,al_c,q_85,usm_0.33_1.00_0.00,enc_avif,quality_auto/282fa6_be0b726565ae4e5e89bb225cb3925cf9f000.jpg)
# CODE THE BODY CAN RUN
![arrow.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/282fa6_d6cc74916bfd41d099977b9b9569322c~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_35,h_35,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/arrow.png)
BIOS IT4 DATASET
Visualisation by Andreas Nicolas Fischer
Anchor 1
![Marble_7.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/282fa6_a638530b290e464586a8f3aa027f1667~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_204,h_310,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Marble_7.png)
![Marble_8.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/282fa6_58653ab7b59d4e1c8c6aee7dae80bbb9~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_341,h_780,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Marble_8.png)
Decades ago, DNA sequencing opened up a new field of precision medicine. Now, AI is doing the same for the nervous system and BIOS is at the forefront, building the infrastructure on which future neural treatments will be discovered, developed, and delivered. 
​
The brain sends our bodies vast amounts of information every second of every day, but when those signals are faulty it can cause our organs and systems to malfunction, causing disease. BIOS has developed neural interfaces and AI that, for the first time, can read and write the body’s neural data, or ‘code’, to understand and
correct those signals in real-time. 
​
BIOS envisions a new field of digital health treatments that use this new data-driven insight from the nervous system to create better, more targeted medicine. Neural digital therapies will use our read/write software to understand the effects on the nerves, leading to more precise creation of pharmaceuticals and software-delivered treatments direct to the nervous system.
Autonomic Therapy
![dot_divider.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/282fa6_d8e76021a5744b8da8141bec91c5e0d5~mv2.png/v1/crop/x_0,y_0,w_2,h_468,q_85,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/282fa6_d8e76021a5744b8da8141bec91c5e0d5~mv2.png)
# REAL-TIME INSIGHTS
With our proprietary neural interface and AI platform, BIOS has the unique ability to measure and analyse neural data in real-time in both acute and chronic settings.
![dot_divider.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/282fa6_d8e76021a5744b8da8141bec91c5e0d5~mv2.png/v1/crop/x_0,y_0,w_2,h_468,q_85,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/282fa6_d8e76021a5744b8da8141bec91c5e0d5~mv2.png)
# NEURAL BIOMARKERS
BIOS has developed a programming language or 'code' for the nervous system that can be used for discovering groundbreaking insights into diseases, and creating new treatments.
# PRECISION HEALTH
Neural digital therapeutics are created by using real-time feedback from the nervous system. This makes better, more targeted drugs, and opens the door for software-delivered therapies.
![Image of marble](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/282fa6_8ef7ce087e054953a3725b4cde42d411~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_49,h_6,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/Marble_3.png)
![Image of a man on a mountainside after exercise.](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/282fa6_dfe6988d6b1e47bcae6b240b77eb0f15~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_221,h_129,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/282fa6_dfe6988d6b1e47bcae6b240b77eb0f15~mv2.jpg)
# HUMAN TECHNOLOGY
We envision a future where we have control over our bodies and lives, enabling radically improved, seamlessly experienced healthcare. We want a better quality of life for everyone living with 
lifelong conditions.
# ECG
![Image of an ECG reading.](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/282fa6_486fd5034e2e43cc8a006cd64735e112~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_99,h_19,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/Lines_ECG.png)
# RESPIRATORY PRESSURE
![Image of a respiratory reading..](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/282fa6_61099fd7149e462793443be09c08b23e~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_93,h_12,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/Lines_BP.png)
# BLOOD GLUCOSE
![Image of a blood glucose reading.](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/282fa6_37108d0d821f429cb50a93e7cd2a3e0c~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_90,h_12,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/Lines_Respiratory.png)
Tech
![marble_5.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/282fa6_a06f03c2d5124d16abb7d7930925012c~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_116,h_254,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_3,enc_avif,quality_auto/marble_5.png)
![Marble_4.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/282fa6_73bf910109474659b43d6190bf76207d~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_49,h_6,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/Marble_4.png)
![Image of the BIOS medical device implant.](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/282fa6_d005d2a63e134f0290c86c309d84777c~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_82,h_59,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/device_lines.png)
#  NEURAL CONTROL OF THE HEART
Cardiovascular diseases are responsible for a third of all deaths globally. BIOS has launched the Autonomic Therapy Initiative (ATI) to discover more about the causal links with the nervous system and to drive forward neural therapies and treatments that could help millions of people.
[READ MORE IN OUR WHITEPAPER](https://www.bios.health/<https:/www.bios.health/whitepaper>)
![Panel_4_Connectors_2.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/282fa6_ac1b66d0d553478b9fbbd07ca638c148~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_130,h_352,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_3,enc_avif,quality_auto/Panel_4_Connectors_2.png)
# INTRODUCING BIOS NEURAL DOSING
Your response to a therapy is as unique as your DNA. BIOS’s Neural Dosing Platform combines high-quality neural recordings with powerful AI and ML techniques to personalise neural therapies in minutes.
[LEARN MORE](https://www.bios.health/<https:/www.bios.health/technology>)
![BIOS Response Surface - Pennsieve.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/282fa6_fc57d65557ba470082283bdde0f4f122~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_60,h_55,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/BIOS%20Response%20Surface%20-%20Pennsieve.png)
![Marble_6.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/282fa6_c02eb5cef0b84cd3bb09b9a0234d1da2~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_123,h_91,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/282fa6_c02eb5cef0b84cd3bb09b9a0234d1da2~mv2.png)
# PARTNER WITH BIOS
BIOS' technology is capable of real-time insights into how pharmaceuticals affect the nervous system, cutting feedback time on efficacy results from months to minutes. We offer long-term partnerships for the co-development of neural digital therapies. 
CONTACT THE BIOS TEAM
![Cup containing various prescribed pills](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/282fa6_9d36077e79564c1197e9ede5477adaca~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_107,h_129,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/pill_cup.jpg)
ATI
![Marble_3.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/282fa6_8ef7ce087e054953a3725b4cde42d411~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_49,h_6,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/Marble_3.png)
![Man with glasses looking at a computer screen with neural data on it](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/282fa6_c709740131cf4b869ec7c592e8b64f14~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_223,h_103,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/282fa6_c709740131cf4b869ec7c592e8b64f14~mv2.jpg)
# SOLVE THE HARD PROBLEMS
We are solving one of the hardest problems in the world, and we need committed, exceptional individuals to join us. We’re currently hiring for a variety of roles in Cambridge and Montreal. 
[CAREERS WITH BIOS](https://www.bios.health/<https:/www.bios.health/careers>)
![Marble_4.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/282fa6_73bf910109474659b43d6190bf76207d~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_49,h_6,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/Marble_4.png)

#  NEURAL CONTROL OF THE HEART
Cardiovascular diseases are responsible for a third of all deaths globally. BIOS has launched the Autonomic Therapy Initiative (ATI) to discover more about the causal links with the nervous system and to drive forward neural therapies and treatments that could help millions of people.
READ MORE IN OUR WHITEPAPER⟨20⟩
![Panel_4_Connectors_2.png⟨21⟩]
# INTRODUCING BIOS NEURAL DOSING
Your response to a therapy is as unique as your DNA. BIOS’s Neural Dosing Platform combines high-quality neural recordings with powerful AI and ML techniques to personalise neural therapies in minutes.
LEARN MORE⟨22⟩
![BIOS Response Surface - Pennsieve.png⟨23⟩]
![Marble_6.png⟨24⟩]
# PARTNER WITH BIOS
BIOS' technology is capable of real-time insights into how pharmaceuticals affect the nervous system, cutting feedback time on efficacy results from months to minutes. We offer long-term partnerships for the co-development of neural digital therapies. 
CONTACT THE BIOS TEAM
![Cup containing various prescribed pills⟨25⟩]
ATI
![Marble_3.png⟨12⟩]
![Man with glasses looking at a computer screen with neural data on it⟨26⟩]
# SOLVE THE HARD PROBLEMS
We are solving one of the hardest problems in the world, and we need committed, exceptional individuals to join us. We’re currently hiring for a variety of roles in Cambridge and Montreal. 
CAREERS WITH BIOS⟨7⟩

generated_description:
**Company Overview: BIOS Health**

**Name:** BIOS Health  
**Formerly Known As:** Cambridge Bio-Augmentation Systems (CBAS)  
**Founded:** Not specified in the data  
**Y Combinator Batch:** W17  
**Location:** Cambridge, United Kingdom  
**Team Size:** 45 employees  

### Mission
BIOS Health aims to pioneer neural interfaces that can understand and utilize nerve data for medical applications. The focus here is on innovating how we treat and manage health through neurotechnology.

### What They Do
Initially, BIOS Health concentrated on prosthetic neural interfaces, but they've since expanded their horizons. They are at the forefront of creating a new field defined by "neural digital therapeutics." By combining artificial intelligence with neural interfaces, BIOS can comprehensively read and write the body’s neural data—effectively decoding the "language" of our nervous system.

This means they’re not just deciphering neural signals to understand what’s happening in real time, but they’re also able to correct faulty signals. This could revolutionize how we approach diseases, as BIOS envisions personalized drugs and software solutions that target the nervous system.

### Key Initiatives
1. **Real-Time Insights:** Their proprietary platform allows for immediate feedback, which is critical for both acute and chronic medical conditions.
2. **Neural Biomarkers:** BIOS is developing a programming language for the nervous system to better understand conditions and craft new treatments.
3. **Precision Health:** By integrating real-time data, they aim to improve drug efficacy and deliver software solutions directly targeting neural pathways.
4. **Autonomic Therapy Initiative (ATI):** This particular program looks closely at the connections between cardiovascular disease and the nervous system, working towards viable neural therapies.

### Company Culture and Opportunities
BIOS encourages collaboration and innovation, seeking exceptional individuals to join its mission. They are currently hiring for various roles, looking for people who are dedicated to solving complex healthcare challenges.

### Partnerships and Recognition
The company has received accolades for its groundbreaking work in neurotechnology and precision medicine, being recognized as a top startup by major publications and participating in prestigious programs like Y Combinator.

If you’re interested in learning more about their work or exploring partnership opportunities, you can visit their website: [BIOS Health](https://www.bios.health).
